column2: "Hunters are a must for any party, thanks to their awesome attack and defense capabilities."
"But that comes with a heavy burden. We may have the power to overwhelm the enemy, but one false move and we put the whole party in danger."
"That's why we always have to keep tabs on the battle raging around us. Even I'm still learning how to do that."
"How about you join me on the Floating Continent to practice a little teamwork?"
